mapper.insert: insert into review(review_id, review_date, content, good, grade, user_id, menu_id, sweet, bitter, sour) values(review_seq.nextval, sysdate, #{content}, #{good}, #{grade}, #{userId}, #{menuId}, #{sweet}, #{bitter}, #{sour})
mapper.update: update review set content=#{content}, grade=#{grade}, sweet=#{sweet}, bitter=#{bitter}, sour=#{sour} where review_id=#{reviewId}
mapper.select: select review_id, review_date, content, good, grade, user_id, menu_id, sweet, bitter, sour from review where menu_id=#{menuId} order by review_date desc
select review_id, review_date, content, good, grade, user_id, menu_id, sweet, bitter, sour from review where user_id=#{userId} order by review_date desc
select review_id, review_date, content, good, grade, user_id, menu_id, sweet, bitter, sour from review where menu_id=#{menuId} order by good desc
mapper.update: update review set good=case when good>0 then good-1 else 0 end where review_id=#{reviewId}
